body.TroubleScaling: Trouble scaling the game? Use Ctrl - and Ctrl Shift + to scale the game, and refresh with Ctrl R
body.cheats1: Achievements are paused with Cheats enabled
body.cheats2: Holding ONE (1) halts the physics engine only
body.cheats5: Pressing FOUR (4) deletes all dead shapes
body.cheats6: Pressing FIVE (5) causes a nuclear explosion
body.cheats7: Holding SIX (6) runs the physics engine 3x as fast
body.donateMSG: help me out to make more funny games for cheap. I'm 14 from australia so keep note that any financial support will likely go towards flavoured milk.
body.CG1: You can create & play custom gamemodes via a mod script. Read https://github.com/codingMASTER398/dodecadone-mod-docs/ to learn how to make your own!
body.CG2: Achievements cannot be gained with a custom gamemode.
body.CG6: Find more on the Steam Workshop!
